TopicTitle: What's up with the crazy looking RCS plumes in 1.4.2?

Articles.Content:
Just upgraded from 1.3.1 to 1.4.2. Flew first saved game mission and first thing I noticed was the new RCS plume affect. I just don't like it at all. Plumes shooting out twice distance of the ship essentially whiting out everything around it. Just looks plain weird to me. I sure hope there is fix or workaround for this to get it back to the way it was. This is a deal breaker for me personally as I just can't get used to it. Kind of destroys the cool effect of the RCS thrusters the way they were before. Edit: Found this was happening on FASA parts, RCS and Engines. FASA is one of my favorite mods, I hope they update it to 1.4.2.

Edited April 9, 2018 by MikeO89
